original_text: who were burying all their firstborn, whom the Lord had struck down among them; for the Lord had brought judgment on their gods.
korean_text: 애굽인은 여호와께서 그들 중에 치신 그 모든 장자를 장사하는 때라 여호와께서 그들의 신들에게도 벌을 주셨더라

sentences.original_text: who were burying all their firstborn
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 모든 장자를 장사하고 있던 사람들

sentences.original_text: whom the Lord had struck down among them
for the Lord had brought judgment
